channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump, without evidence, accuses Trudeau of using tariff dispute to stay in power

item.title: Rep. Adrian Smith: US needs to be 'aggressive and effective' with tariffs
